attributes.action: Schools To Allow Toilets At All Times During The Day
attributes.additional_details: Schools should let us use the toilet because holding in the toilet can cause injuries
attributes.background: Most schools in the UK don't allow for children to use the toilets during lesson time, which alot of people think is against their human rights. I think this should change

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422
